short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Intelligent Search for the Inquisitive Mind

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With NLMatics Motif, you can get precise answers to your questions from any webpage or pdf you open up on your browser, and share your research with your team.

Whether you are researching a stock, a product purchase, preparing a report, or reading journal articles,  Motif empowers you to get specific information you are looking for in matter of seconds, simply by asking questions, without you ever having to read the through the contents. Once you find your answers, you can instantly share your research with your team.

Request a free trial here: https://www.nlmatics.com/request-free-trial
